topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the DCN Subnet Patch

body.section:
This patch fixes an issue that causes Neutron subnet creation to fail when DHCP is set to No Gateway on the SharedMGMT subnet.
Notes:
This patch is not required for DCN 3.2R7 environments.
This patch is not required for the Denver topology.

ol.li: Launch the Software Updates and Licensing site.
Download the HCG2.0_DCN004_Patch020 patch and the associated checksum and signature files.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.

Extract the compressed file until the HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw directory is available:
Extract the HCG2.0_DCN004_Patch020.tar.gz compressed file.
Extract the metadata.tar.gz compressed file.
Extract the metadata.tar compressed file.
The HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw is inside the metadata/roles directory.

Log into the lifecycle manager VM. ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
. Copy the complete folder HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw to the /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/patches directory on lifecycle manager VM
Execute following command to apply patch: hlm patch -c <cloud-name> -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t <tier-to-apply>Example: hlm patch -c sac36 -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t BASE-CCP-T2
